decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Conditions 9 (Delivery and Service Management Plan) and 10 (Construction Management Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
